name: admin
title: Admin Data Transfer API
description: Transfers user data from one user to another.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.

userIp.description: IP address of the site where the request originates. Use this if you want to enforce per-user limits.

https://www.googleapis.com/auth/admin.da.description: View and manage data transfers between users in your organization
View data transfers between users in your organization

Application.description: The JSON template for an Application resource.

kind.description: Identifies the resource as a DataTransfer Application Resource.

transferParams.description: The list of all possible transfer parameters for this application. These parameters can be used to select the data of the user in this application to be transfered.

ApplicationDataTransfer.description: Template to map fields of ApplicationDataTransfer resource.

applicationTransferParams.description: The transfer parameters for the application. These parameters are used to select the data which will get transfered in context of this application.

applicationTransferStatus.description: Current status of transfer for this application. (Read-only)

key.description: The type of the transfer parameter. eg: 'PRIVACY_LEVEL'

value.description: The value of the coressponding transfer parameter. eg: 'PRIVATE' or 'SHARED'

ApplicationsListResponse.description: Template for a collection of Applications.

applications.description: List of applications that support data transfer and are also installed for the customer.

kind.description: Identifies the resource as a collection of Applications.

nextPageToken.description: Continuation token which will be used to specify next page in list API.

DataTransfer.description: The JSON template for a DataTransfer resource.

applicationDataTransfers.description: List of per application data transfer resources. It contains data transfer details of the applications associated with this transfer resource. Note that this list is also used to specify the applications for which data transfer has to be done at the time of the transfer resource creation.

kind.description: Identifies the resource as a DataTransfer request.

newOwnerUserId.description: ID of the user to whom the data is being transfered.

oldOwnerUserId.description: ID of the user whose data is being transfered.

requestTime.description: The time at which the data transfer was requested (Read-only).

DataTransfersListResponse.description: Template for a collection of DataTransfer resources.

kind.description: Identifies the resource as a collection of data transfer requests.

nextPageToken.description: Continuation token which will be used to specify next page in list API.

get.description: Retrieves information about an application for the given application ID.

applicationId.description: ID of the application resource to be retrieved.

list.description: Lists the applications available for data transfer for a customer.

customerId.description: Immutable ID of the Google Apps account.

maxResults.description: Maximum number of results to return. Default is 100.

pageToken.description: Token to specify next page in the list.

get.description: Retrieves a data transfer request by its resource ID.

dataTransferId.description: ID of the resource to be retrieved. This is returned in the response from the insert method.

list.description: Lists the transfers for a customer by source user, destination user, or status.

customerId.description: Immutable ID of the Google Apps account.

maxResults.description: Maximum number of results to return. Default is 100.

pageToken.description: Token to specify the next page in the list.
